ygData.subject: Re: FireStrike's Rage
ygData.msgSnippet: Megatron slowly raised his fusiond cannon, his hand palm down. The sneer on his broken face showed his fury. He then brought his other hand up, palm facing up,

Subject: Re: FireStrike's Rage
References: <9hbnkh+dc0a@...>
Content-Type: text/plain; charset=us-ascii
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit
From: robertdahl <rdahl@...>

Megatron slowly raised his fusiond cannon, his hand palm down. The sneer
on his broken face showed his fury. He then brought his other hand up,
palm facing up, and clapped, and laughed. "Very good, Bravo, Bravo.
Someone I know said something like that, a very long time ago." Megatron
told them.
